title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Machine Learning-Based Crop Disease Prediction and Early Harvest Optimization Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Classify crop disease types with over 85% accuracy using random forest algorithms
Identify crop disease areas with over 90% precision using image segmentation techniques
Integrate early harvest timing and disease management strategies through simulation tools
Build and validate disease prediction models based on public datasets (crop_science, etc.)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
